name: Shrimp Survival
description: The 3rd person game with rpg mechanics about the shrimp. You should to try your best in surviving 'cause there's a timer and you could be eaten by sharks and fishes. Also you can eat them by yourself if you have enough power to do this. By eating everything you're getting upgrade sharps which help you upgrade your shrimp. That's all you need to know. Now try this delicious shrimp<3 #rpg #survival
